nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels Magazine 2 is the second issue of Star Wars Rebels Magazine. It was published by Egmont UK Ltd in the UK on February 25, 2015, and by Titan Magazines in the US on December 15, 2015. The issue includes the original comic story Learning Patience by Martin Fisher and Ingo Römling; the comic's US version also included the comic story The fake Jedi, which was originally published in Star Wars Rebels Magazine 3 in the UK.
